labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit, Version 1709 Fall Creators Update OS Build 16299.125
data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 9837, Version Hash: db810e582f3588e476ec3f4bfd029dd7c02b8603
data.expected_result: You should be able to leave the call as per usual, and Discord will remain active.
data.short_description: When doing a group video call and using screen share (with Soundshare on), leaving the call will cause Discord to crash & restart.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a video call on a group DM - Turn on Screenshare (and make sure Soundshare is on)- Leave the call
